section.p: This section lists and describes all relevant clinical problems at the time the summary is generated. At a minimum, all pertinent current and historical problems should be listed. CDA R2 represents problems as Observations.

The active problem section shall contain a narrative description of the conditions currently being monitored for the patient. It shall include entries for patient conditions as described in the Entry Content Module.
The Problem List Section contains data on the problems currently being monitored for the patient.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11450-4" Problem list (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-141, CONF-142)
